casebody.data:
MARIN ASSOCIATION OF PUBLIC EMPLOYEES
v.
MARIN COUNTY EMPLOYEES' RETIREMENT ASSOCIATION (STATE OF CALIFORNIA) S237460 Supreme Court of California November 22, 2016

Votes: Cantil-Sakauye, C.J., Werdegar, Chin, Corrigan, Liu, Cuéllar and Kruger, JJ.

**1105Petition for review granted; briefing deferred. The petition for review is granted. Further action in this matter is deferred pending the decision of the Court of Appeal, First Appellate District, Division Four, in Alameda County Deputy Sheriff's Association **1106et al. v. Alameda County Employees' Retirement Association et al., A141913 (see Cal. Rules of Court, rule 8.512(d)(2) ) or pending further order of the court. Submission of additional briefing, pursuant to California Rules of Court, rule 8.520, is deferred pending further order of the court.
